title: Little Flower = Xiao Hua [NTSC]
creator_credit: Beijing Film Studio and Zhang Zheng
brief_description: Set in 1930, this melodrama focuses on the fate of two sisters who are separated as babies and grow up in different families unaware of each other’s existence. They are reunited by chance as young adults after they join the People’s Liberation Army where they also discover their long lost brother. Cast includes Joan Chen, Liu Xiaoquing, Cheng Chong and Guoqiang Tang. In Mandarin with English subtitles.
